SEARCH
Package com.app.repository.impl.generic.impl

Class AbstractCrudRepository<T,ID>

java.lang.Object
com.app.repository.impl.generic.impl.AbstractCrudRepository<T,ID>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the entity managed by this repository.
ID - The type of the entity's identifier.
All Implemented Interfaces:
CrudRepository<T,ID>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnswerRepositoryImpl, PlayerRepositoryImpl, QuestRepositoryImpl, StatisticRepositoryImpl
public class AbstractCrudRepository<T,ID> extends Object implements CrudRepository<T,ID>
Abstract implementation of a CRUD repository, providing generic methods for persisting and retrieving entities from a database using JDBI.
